speech:
We offer a range of hair courses tailored to your learning needs. Here's a quick overview:

Short-Term Hair Courses:

1. Universal Certificate in Hair Techno: 10 days
2. International Certificate in Hair Designing: 20 days
3. International Certificate in Chemical Treatments: 1 month
4. International Certificate in Creative Hair Cuts: 1 month
5. International Certificate in Volumizing Techniques: 1 month
6. International Certificate in Hair Extension: 2 months
7. International Certificate in 3D Hair Color Techno: 2 months
